Sat Data Ingest

Start by drawing a rectangle using the button. Set a date and time, then a timespan. Then click "Add sat data".

Rectangle is too large, edit it using and try again!

Notes :

This demo makes requests for Sentinel-2 L2A PREVIEW data (max. resolution 1500m per pixel), atmospherically corrected imagery from the European Commission's Coperinicus programme's Senitinel 2 satellite.

This tool requests True Colour images, with bands 02, 03, 04 mapped to the red, blue and green channels respectively. Samples are remapped from [0, 1] to [0, 255], then multiplied by a brightness factor of 2.5.

Black pixels in the response indicate no data, typically when the request area is outside the temporal or spatial coverage of this satellite, which covers land and coastal areas between latitudes 56°S and 83°N, since 2017, with a revisit time of 5 days or less, dependant on latitude.

White pixels in the response indicate cloud cover, if the requested timespan contains more than one visit, the image with the least cloud coverage is stacked on top.

Credit: Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel data processed by Sentinel Hub
